data: {"generalSituation":"Under the influence of a replenishment of the northeast monsoon, it will be windy and cloudier over the coast of Guangdong today and tomorrow. With an anticyclone aloft strengthening, the weather over southern China will be mainly fine with temperatures rising over the weekend. Besides, Tropical Cyclone Kalmaegi will move across the central and southern parts of the South China Sea, towards the vicinity of central Vietnam today and tomorrow. Tropical Cyclone Fung-wong will intensify gradually and move in the general direction of the vicinity of Luzon in the next few days. It will then have a higher chance of entering the northeastern part of the South China Sea. Under the influence of the northeast monsoon, its location of the turn remains uncertain.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251106","week":"Thursday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore and on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. Sunny intervals during the day.
